title: Divine Lakshmi Devi Pendant - Antique Finish Temple Jewellery
features: Exquisite Nakshi work depicting Goddess Lakshmi Devi, surrounded by intricately carved peacocks. The diamonds are pave set to enhance the brilliance and create a halo effect. The pendant is finished with seven lustrous South Sea Pearl drops (Moti bottu). Features meticulous detailing characteristic of traditional temple jewellery.
occasions: and other traditional South Indian celebrations. Can also be paired with modern attire for a touch of cultural elegance.
description: This pendant is a true heirloom piece, showcasing the rich heritage of South Indian craftsmanship. The intricate Nakshi work and divine Lakshmi motif symbolize prosperity and good fortune. The combination of gold, diamonds, rubies, emerald, and pearls creates a captivating and luxurious look. The antique finish adds a timeless charm, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
